name: Faus & Moliner Abogados S.L.P.
goal: Law firm specializing in legal matters specific to the pharmaceutical industry and the "Life Sciences" sector. We advise companies that operate in this sector as well as public administrations.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Public consultation on supplementary protection certificates (SPCs) and patent research exemptions.
